item.title: Torrent: 1. How a .torrent file works
item.description: Scope of this blog To be able to understand what a torrent file does. What does contents inside torrent file do. How you download a torrent. Say you were to download arch linux from the provided torrent file on the archlinux website. You would Download the file from the website load the file onto a torrent client like deluge/transmission/uTorrent etc and it begins downloading. Observing a torrent file Let’s disect the Arch Linux Iso and open the file.
